wiki_tab.content:
Capo: 1st fret
Play: G
Key: Ab

For chords in original key transpose this chord sheet +1 (and "use flats").

Play this song with the regular shapes of the chords given in this song
or use the ones that can be heard on the recording:

[tab]      E-A-D-G-B-e
G     3-x-0-0-3(3)
Em    0-2-2-0-3(3) (= Em7)
C     x-3-2-0-3(3) (= Cadd9)
[Coda]
Dsus4 x-x-0-2-3-3 or x-x-0-0-3-3 (= a D chord which is neither major nor minor)
G/B   x-2-0-0-0-3  (= G chord with a "b" as the root)
D/F#  2-x-0-2-3-x  (= D chord with a "f#" as the root)[/tab]

The "%" signs mean "repeat the bar before", so "| D | % |" = two bars of D. 
It's a common abbreviation. (Real Book etc.: https://www.swiss-jazz.ch/standards-jazz/AllOfMe.pdf)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[Intro]
[ch]G[/ch]

[Verse 1]
[tab]          [ch]G[/ch]        [ch]Em[/ch]
I found a love for me[/tab]
[tab]              [ch]C[/ch]                            [ch]D[/ch]
Darling, just dive right in, and follow my lead[/tab]
[tab]                [ch]G[/ch]          [ch]Em[/ch]
Well, I found a girl beautiful and sweet[/tab]
[tab]        [ch]C[/ch]                                     [ch]D[/ch]
I never knew you were the someone waiting for me[/tab]

[Pre-Chorus]
[tab]                              
  [ch]G[/ch]
Cause we were just kids when we fell in love[/tab]
[tab]            [ch]Em[/ch]                
      [ch]C[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]  [ch]D[/ch]
Not knowing what it was, I will not give you up this ti-ime[/tab]
[tab]             [ch]G[/ch]                           [ch]Em[/ch]
Darling just kiss me slow, your heart is all I own[/tab]
[tab]            [ch]C[/ch]                     [ch]D[/ch]
And in your eyes you're holding mine[/tab]

[Chorus]
[tab]      [ch]Em[/ch]   [ch]C[/ch]             [ch]G[/ch]          [ch]D[/ch]              [ch]Em[/ch]
Baby, I'm dancing in the dark, with you between my arms[/tab]
[tab][ch]C[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]     [ch]D[/ch]                [ch]Em[/ch]
Barefoot on the grass, listening to our favourite song[/tab]
[tab]          [ch]C[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]                 [ch]D[/ch]            
  [ch]Em[/ch]
When you said you looked a mess, I whispered underneath my breath[/tab]
[tab]         [ch]C[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]        [ch]D[/ch]          [ch]G[/ch]
But you heard it, darling you look perfect tonight[/tab]

|([ch]G[/ch]) [ch]D/F#[/ch] [ch]Em[/ch] [ch]D[/ch] | [ch]C[/ch]  [ch]D[/ch]  |

[Verse 2]
[tab]                [ch]G[/ch]                    [ch]Em[/ch]
Well, I found a woman, stronger than anyone I know[/tab]
[tab]              [ch]C[/ch]                                          [ch]D[/ch]
She shares my dreams, I hope that someday I'll share her home[/tab]
[tab]           [ch]G[/ch]             [ch]Em[/ch]
I found a love, to carry more than just my secrets[/tab]
[tab]         [ch]C[/ch]                              [ch]D[/ch]
To carry love, to carry children of our own[/tab]

[Pre-Chorus]
[tab]                           
  [ch]G[/ch]                     [ch]Em[/ch]
We are still kids, but we're so in love, fighting against all odds[/tab]
[tab]             [ch]C[/ch]               [ch]G[/ch]  [ch]D[/ch]
I know we'll be alright this ti-ime[/tab]
[tab]             [ch]G[/ch]                              [ch]Em[/ch]
Darling just hold my hand, be my girl, I'll be your man[/tab]
[tab]         [ch]C[/ch]               [ch]D[/ch]
I see my future in your eyes[/tab]

[Chorus]
[tab]      [ch]Em[/ch]   [ch]C[/ch]              [ch]G[/ch]         [ch]D[/ch]         
     [ch]Em[/ch]
Baby, I'm dancing in the dark, with you between my arms[/tab]
[tab][ch]C[/ch]              
  [ch]G[/ch]     [ch]D[/ch]                [ch]Em[/ch]
Barefoot on the grass, listening to our favourite song[/tab]
[tab]        [ch]C[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]                [ch]D[/ch]
When I saw you in that dress, looking so beautiful[/tab]
[tab]  [ch]Em[/ch]       [ch]C[/ch]                  [ch]G[/ch]        [ch]D[/ch]          [ch]G[/ch]
I don't deserve this, darling you look perfect tonight[/tab]

[Interlude]
|([ch]G[/ch]) | [ch]G[/ch] | [ch]Em[/ch] | % |
| [ch]C[/ch]  | % | [ch]D[/ch]  | % |

[Chorus]
[tab]      [ch]Em[/ch]   [ch]C[/ch]              [ch]G[/ch]         [ch]D[/ch]              [ch]Em[/ch]
Baby, I'm dancing in the dark, with you between my arms[/tab]
[tab][ch]C[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]     [ch]D[/ch]              
  [ch]Em[/ch]
Barefoot on the grass, listening to our favourite song[/tab]
[tab]        [ch]C[/ch]          
    [ch]G[/ch]               [ch]D[/ch]             [ch]Em[/ch]
I have faith in what I see, now I know I have met an angel[/tab]
[tab]    [ch]C[/ch]          [ch]G[/ch]         [ch]D[/ch]
In person, and she looks perfect[/tab]

[Outro]
[tab]  [ch]G/B[/ch]     [ch]C[/ch]           [ch]Dsus4[/ch]    [ch]D[/ch]          [ch]G[/ch]
I don't deserve this, you look perfect tonight[/tab]

|([ch]G[/ch]) [ch]D/F#[/ch] [ch]Em[/ch] [ch]D[/ch] | [ch]C[/ch]  [ch]D[/ch]  | [ch]G[/ch]

tuning.name: Standard
tuning.value: E A D G B E

versions.version_description: Defined fingerpicking riff, identified more accurate chord shapes, tabbed solo during interlude.
Capo on 1st fret for original key.

last_comments.text: I use a d/f# instead of a f#m
